channel.title: ozone, designdoc on Apache Hadoop Ozone Development notes
channel.description: Recent content in ozone, designdoc on Apache Hadoop Ozone Development notes

item.title: S3 Access key management for improved usability
item.description: NOTE: latest version can be found in the Apache repository Problem statement Ozone has the semantics of volume and buckets while S3 has only buckets. To make it possible to use the same bucket both from Hadoop world and via S3 we need a mapping between then.
